text:
Adolfo Nicolás Pachón (29 April 1936 – 20 May 2020) was a Spanish priest of the Roman Catholic Church. He was the thirtieth Superior General of the Society of Jesus from 2008 to 2016. He was born in Villamuriel de Cerrato, Spain.
Nicolás Pachón died on 20 May 2020 at a hospital in Tokyo from a long-illness, aged 84.
